##### Insights into US Bikeshare Companies 

```{r libraries, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(scales)
```


##### Q1. Total Trips

```{r q1-biketrips, include=FALSE}
q1 <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cheryltky/bikeshare_studies/main/csvdata/Q1.csv", sep=",", header = T)
head(q1)
str(q1)
```

```{r bluebikes, echo = FALSE, error =FALSE}
bluebikes <- q1 %>% 
  tail(10) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x= month_year,y=trips_bluebike))+
geom_point(shape=21, color="orange",size=2)+
ggtitle("2019 Divvybikes Trip Count")

bluebikes

```
